languages.text: {n}Идира отнимает руку от головы и пытается стереть слезы, оставляя кровавый след на лице. Потом, поморщившись, прикасается к перегоревшему {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланту{/g}.{/n} "Я... не знаю. Должно быть тихо... но в голове... шепот громче. Так... не должно быть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира опускает руку и смотрит на перемазанную кровью ладонь. Потом, поморщившись, прикасается к перегоревшему импланту.{/n} "Я... не знаю. Обычно после такого в голове тихо... а сейчас наоборот. Шепот еще ближе. Еще громче. Так... не должно быть".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира отнимает руку от головы и пытается стереть слезы, оставляя кровавый след на лице. languages.text: {n}伊迪拉将手从头上移开，试图擦干眼泪，在脸上留下了几道血印。随后，她摸了摸被烧坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，皱起了眉。{/n}“我……不知道……它按理说不应该再有声音了……但在我的脑子里……窃窃私语的声音却变得更响了。不应该是……这个样子的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉将手从头上移开，试图擦干眼泪，在脸上留下了几道血印。随后，她摸了摸被烧坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，皱起了眉。{/n}“我……不知道……它按理说不应该再有声音了……但在我的脑子里……窃窃私语的声音却变得更响了。不应该是……这个样子的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se quita la mano de la cabeza para intentar secarse las lágrimas, manchándose la cara de sangre. Después toca su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} quemado y frunce el ceño.{/n} «No... No lo sé. Debería haber silencio... pero en mi cabeza... los susurros son más fuertes. No debería... ser así».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

Después toca su {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} quemado y frunce el ceño.{/n} «No... No lo sé. Debería haber silencio... pero en mi cabeza... los susurros son más fuertes. No debería... ser así».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは頭から手を離し、涙を拭おうとした。そして、彼女は自分の焼け焦げた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}に触れて顔をしかめた。{/n}「あたい…わからないわ。静かなはずなのに…あたいの頭の中では…ささやく声が大きくなっている。こんなはずじゃ…なかったのに…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは頭から手を離し、涙を拭おうとした。そして、彼女は自分の焼け焦げた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}に触れて顔をしかめた。{/n}「あたい…わからないわ。静かなはずなのに…あたいの頭の中では…ささやく声が大きくなっている。こんなはずじゃ…なかったのに…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Idira ihre Hand vom Kopf nimmt und versucht, sich ihre Tränen abzuwischen, hinterlässt sie blutige Spuren auf ihrem Gesicht. Dann berührt sie stirnrunzelnd ihr verkohltes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}.{/n} "Ich ... weiß nicht. Es sollte still sein ... aber in meinem Kopf ... ist das Flüstern lauter. So sollte es ... nicht sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Idira ihre Hand vom Kopf nimmt und versucht, sich ihre Tränen abzuwischen, hinterlässt sie blutige Spuren auf ihrem Gesicht. Dann berührt sie stirnrunzelnd ihr verkohltes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}.{/n} Ich ... weiß nicht. Es sollte still sein ... aber in meinem Kopf ... ist das Flüstern lauter. So sollte es ... nicht sein."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira ôte sa main de son crâne et tente de sécher ses larmes, maculant au passage son visage de traînées de sang. Elle effleure son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} grillé et fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Je... je ne sais pas... Le silence devrait être revenu... mais les murmures dans ma tête... sont de plus en plus forts. Ce n'est pas normal... Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

Le silence devrait être revenu... mais les murmures dans ma tête sont de plus en plus forts. Ce n'est pas normal... Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond. »

languages.text: {n}İdira, elini başından çekip gözyaşlarını silmeye çalışırken yüzünde kanlı izler bırakıyor. Daha sonra kaşlarını çatarak yanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantına{/g} dokunuyor.{/n} "Bilmiyorum... Sessiz olmalı ama... Kafamın içinde... Fısıltılar susmuyor. Böyle olmamalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira removes her hand from her head and tries to wipe away her tears, leaving bloody marks on her face. Then she touches her burnt-out {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}, frowning.{/n} "I... don't know. It should be quiet... but in my head... the whispering's louder. It shouldn't be... like that."

Daha sonra kaşlarını çatarak yanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantına{/g} dokunuyor.{/n} "Bilmiyorum... Sessiz olmalı ama... Kafamın içinde... Fısıltılar susmuyor. Böyle olmamalı."
